sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
    <v-container>
        <v-row v-for="investment in investments"
                :key="investment.id"
                dense>
          <v-col
            :cols="5">
            <v-text-field
              @change="addToChanged(investment)"
              :value="investment.custom_name ? investment.custom_name : investment.name.name"
              @input="investment.custom_name = $event"
              hide-details="auto"
              dense solo />
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="3">
            <v-currency-field
              @change="addToChanged(investment)"
              v-model="investment.amount"
              hide-details="auto"
              prefix="$"
              :decimal-length="0"
              dense solo />
          </v-col>
          <v-col>
            <v-card>

            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col>
            <InvestmentDetail
              @add-investment="getInvestmentData"
              v-on="$listeners"
              :custom="false"
              :investment="investment"
              :nameList="nameList"
              :investmentClassList="investmentClassList"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col>
            <DeleteObj
              :objectType="'investment'"
              :objectToDelete="investment"
              :portfolioId="investment.portfolio"
              @delete-object="getInvestmentData"
              v-on="$listeners"
            />
          </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row v-if="investments.length">
        <v-col>
          <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" dark dense>Update</v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <InvestmentDetail
        @add-investment="getInvestmentData"
        v-on="$listeners"
        :custom="true"
        :nameList="nameList"
        :investmentClassList="investmentClassList"
      />

      <AddInvestment @add-investment="getInvestmentData" v-on="$listeners" />
      <AddPortfolio @add-portfolio="getInvestmentData" v-on="$listeners" />
    </v-container>
  </v-form>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import AddInvestment from "@/components/AddInvestment.vue";
import AddPortfolio from "@/components/AddPortfolio.vue";
import InvestmentDetail from "@/components/InvestmentDetail.vue";
import DeleteObj from "@/components/DeleteObj.vue";

export default {
  name: "InvestmentSummary",
  inject: ["platformId", "scenarioId"],
  props: {},
  components: {
    AddInvestment,
    AddPortfolio,
    DeleteObj,
    InvestmentDetail
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null,
      investments: [],
      portfolio: {},
      nameList: [],
      changeList: [],
      investmentClassList: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getInvestmentData() {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/`;
        apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
          this.investments = data.results;
        });
    },
    getInvestmentClassList() {
      let endpoint = `/api/investmentclass/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
        this.investmentClassList = data.results;
      });
    },
    getRPNameData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/activeriskprofilenames/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.nameList = data.results;
      });
    },
    addInvestment(investment) {
      this.investments.push(investment);
    },
    addPortfolio(portfolio) {
      this.portfolio = portfolio;
    },
    deleteObj(objectToDelete) {
      this.$delete(this.investments, this.investments.indexOf(objectToDelete));
    },
    addToChanged(investment) {
      if (!(this.changeList.includes(investment))) {
        this.changeList.push(investment);
      } else {
        const i = this.changeList.findIndex(item => item.id === investment.id);
        this.changeList.splice(i, 1);
        this.changeList.push(investment);
      }
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.changeList) {
        for (let i=0; i < this.changeList.length; i++) {
          let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${this.changeList[i].id}/`;
          apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
            custom_name: this.changeList[i].custom_name,
            amount: this.changeList[i].amount,
          }).then(data => {
            this.getInvestmentData()
            this.$emit("add-investment", data);
          });
        };
      };
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getInvestmentData();
    this.getInvestmentClassList();
    this.getRPNameData();
  }
};
</script>
